trends: There have been 82 other sightings in Washington
There were no other sightings in Washington on or around August 12th 2011
divs: Sighting Details6 or more intensely bright orb objects observed maneuvering in formation at low altitude. They performed intricate geometric formations together in sequences of random patterns before departing. Some witnesses were frightened by speed and unusual combinations of patterns, close proximity. Others intrigued by what appeared to be holographs under intelligent control; scientists observing phonemena speculated they are possibly holographic displays from a satellite projection or other similar military experiment.
Summary: Witness prefers to be anonymous. Lights observed by 5 witnesses for over an hour. Witnesses were frightened by event due to proximity.
